snippet: The Qatari foreign minister, Sheik Hamad bin Jassim al-Thani, said that technical help from the United Nations could help enhance the performance of monitors in Syria who lack experience.
abstract: Qatari Foreign Min Sheik Hamad bin Jassim al-Thani consults with United Nations Sec Gen Ban Ki-moon about enhancing the performance of the Arab League monitors in Syria, who he says lack experience.
lead_paragraph: The Qatari foreign minister, Sheik Hamad bin Jassim al-Thani, said that technical help from the United Nations could help enhance the performance of monitors in Syria who lack experience.

headline.main: Role of Monitors in Syria Comes Under Scrutiny
headline.print_headline: Role of Monitors in Syria Comes Under Scrutiny
